Posts.Content: waterdn wrote: Since January sometime, I have been experiencing increasing pain in my bones. Joints, yes, but in the whole bone as well. Keeps me from sleeping, increases when I lie on them, sometimes worse, but always there. Sent to an RA doc who wants to call it Fibro. But seeing my oncologist on Mon. Afraid of bone mets. Friend's sister died of bone mets 12 years after surviving stage I BC. Â Any help? waterdn Dx 8/30/2007, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/11 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Bone pain..Bone mets? waterdn mawhinney
